alert.note: Alert for Craighead (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 8:18PM CDT until March 27 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Arkansas... Saint Francis River at Lake City For the Saint Francis River...including Saint Francis, Lake City, Madison...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Saint Francis River at Lake City. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Flooding is occurring in the swamps along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 10.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 PM CDT Saturday was 10.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 9.2 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
